name: Square fly
description:
Welcome to Square fly. 

This game is still in BETA so expect bugs. 

How to play this game? 
Tap on your screen to make the square jump. Tap and hold on to the screen will make your square double jump. 

What is the objective? 
Make your square complete each level. Each level will be harder and harder. Avoid the moving square that goes left-right and blocking your way to the next level.
